page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT IN ARMTHORPE
page.content:
A survey carried out in a junior school shows that approximately 60% of mothers work.This table shows the type of employment undertaken by males and females in this area. {Males % Females % Factory 23.0 Factory 6.5 Police-firemen 3.2 Catering 7.8 Skilled men 23.8 Hairdressers 1.3 Drivers 5.6 Drivers 2.6 Mining 19.6 Armed Forces 1.6 Students 1.3 Teaching 3.2 Teaching 7.8 Nursing 1.6 Nursing 14.3 Sales 4.8 Sales 31.2 Engineers 3.2 Offices 7.8 Offices 12.9 Services 2.4 Services 11.7 Leisure 0.8 Leisure 2.6
Totals {100.0 } {100.0
